__e: When they ask you to bring someone back, they don't mean as a corpse.
I never should have brought you here. She promised me she wouldn't do this.
We shouldn't have brought this up here.
Tell him to bring them here, without talking to anyone.
But you'd be surprised how many people bring their dogs here and then never come back.
Maybe you should bring him... and the others, if you think they'd be interested.
I hope you don't mind, I had your desk brought in.
I'd like to show you something.
I actually brought you here to talk to you about something else.
